articles.author: Steve Aschburner
articles.title: 2025 NBA Finals: 4 things to watch for in crucial Game 4 of Finals - NBA
articles.description: Bench production has dictated the Finals so far. Will that trend continue as Indiana seeks a 3-1 lead? Or will OKC pull even?
articles.content:
With the Pacers and Thunder heading into a Game 4, Jalen Rose and Stan Van Gundy break down the key areas of focus for each team.
INDIANAPOLIS Nothing is as pivotal as a seven-game playoff series un… [+7641 chars]
